summary: A command‑line utility that loads a graph dataset, constructs a GAS (Graph Attention Sampling) model with DGL, trains it using PyTorch optimizers, and evaluates performance with common classification metrics such as F1, ROC‑AUC and precision‑recall curves.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example for researchers and engineers to benchmark and experiment with graph neural network sampling techniques on real data, accelerating development of graph‑based machine‑learning solutions.
